summary: Complete testing of Evolute Marketing website - Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), Frontend loads perfectly with all sections, animations, and features working correctly. Contact form integration working.
passed_tests: Backend API - Status check creation and retrieval
Backend API - Contact form submission and retrieval
Frontend - Hero section with mascot loads correctly
Frontend - Navbar with glassmorphism effect working
Frontend - Smooth scroll navigation between sections
Frontend - About section with value cards visible
Frontend - Services section with 6 service cards displayed
Frontend - Portfolio section with project cards visible
Frontend - Contact form UI renders correctly
Frontend - Footer with navigation links working
Frontend - Mascot animation and eye tracking working
Frontend - Gradient backgrounds and animations working
